author: cframpton
msg: Even though the batik and velocity src kits contain jars, this isn't accepted Apache practice so we are removing them from our forks of those kits.  For now, download the jars to the same directories they were in.  The next step is to see if they can be moved to the lib/external directory without messing anything up.
